alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Kenosha; Milwaukee; Racine; Rock; Walworth; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 8:03PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Milwaukee, northern Walworth, northeastern Rock, Racine, southern Waukesha, southern Jefferson and northern Kenosha Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 802 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. Francis to near Wales to near Jefferson to Lake Mills. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milwaukee, Kenosha, Racine, New Berlin, Greenfield, Oak Creek, Mount Pleasant, Muskego, South Milwaukee, Cudahy, Whitewater, Greendale, Fort Atkinson, Elkhorn, St. Francis, Jefferson, Hales Corners, Mukwonago, Sturtevant and Union Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson; Kenosha; Milwaukee; Racine; Rock; Walworth; Waukesha
